title: Mellow Mushroom
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of hippie-themed pizza chain. Has pizzas, calzones, hoagies, plus hummus and pita. Options for pizzas and calzones include tofu, tempeh, artichoke hearts, mushrooms, peppers, sundried tomatoes, and more. Pizza can be made with vegan cheese, hoagies made with tofu and tempeh.
